meanings.sent1: She redoes her homework to correct mistakes.
meanings.sent2: He often redoes his artwork until he is satisfied.
meanings.sent3: The chef redoes the recipe after realizing he forgot an ingredient.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening redoes the look of her backyard every season.
meanings.sent5: The student redoes the experiment to ensure accurate results.

meanings.definition: To make something new or different.
meanings.sent1: The designer redoes the logo to give it a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: She redoes her room with colorful decorations.
meanings.sent3: The magician redoes his trick with a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: His creativity redoes the concept of traditional art.
meanings.sent5: The writer redoes the ending of the story for a better impact.

meanings.definition: To repeat a task or action.
meanings.sent1: He redoes the math problem to understand it better.
meanings.sent2: She redoes her workout routine every week.
meanings.sent3: The child redoes the puzzle for the third time, determined to finish it.
meanings.sent4: The singer redoes the song rehearsal to perfect the performance.
meanings.sent5: The athlete redoes the practice drill to improve skills.
